SEARCH
Package app.src.resources.monsters

Class WaveSpawner

java.lang.Object
app.src.resources.monsters.MonsterSpawner
app.src.resources.monsters.WaveSpawner
public class WaveSpawner extends MonsterSpawner
Extends the MonsterSpawner to create Monsters from a List and allows to limit the amount of a Monster TYPE.
